ygData.subject: Re: newbie- im
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh. heheh But I find that I still hit average faster than others. oh well. Didn t know that. BTW, any1 know how do u drag ur corpse around? ... From: Wilson
ygData.messageBody:
Oh. heheh But I find that I still hit average faster than others. oh well.
Didn't know that. BTW, any1 know how do u drag ur corpse around?
----- Original Message -----
From: Wilson <ritzbits@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 16:18
Subject: [sg-everquest] Re: newbie- im


> From: "Wilson" <ritzbits@...>
>
> Once your Weight Allowance hits over 15, your AC begins to drop for a
Monk.
> Also, your attack speed will drop.
>
> For other classes, you don't have to worry ;-)
>
> Wilson
>
> > From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> >
> > Why 15? I carry close to my weight limit. There's a penalty for
> carrying
> > lose to weight limit? I hardly get to carry lose to that much. heheh.
>
>
